data.text: @ehsteveG I imagine it’s up there with “dyin’ ain’t much of a livin’.”
@lokified No shade to Kimiko cause I’m just kinda recently noticing this myself, but ‘death never goes into recession’ is the ‘it didn’t scan so it must be free’ for undertakers 😂😂💀
@lokified !!!!! The dressing & make up (‘restorative’ if you’re in denial lmao) wound up being one of my favorite aspects!🖤

@Joe_Hunter @lokified That ain’t no problem, I’m glad people recognize the funeral industry has been exploitative for too long. At my home traditionals average 10k or less anyhow. Plus I get the bulk of my $$$ from working full time for a removals co. 😉🖤
@lokified @ehsteveG Oh god I don't want to be that guy but people are doing cremation more and more because it's more cost effective. $700 to burn and bag vs. $16000 for a full funeral.
@lokified @ehsteveG Sometimes your lady is dark, man. Lol
